name: OnBoard Chess
summary: Tired of running into cheaters online? Does playing on a flat, 2D screen leave you disconnected from the thrill of a real-life chess experience? OnBoard Chess is here to change that. Offering a truly immersive, over-the-board experience, OnBoard Chess brings the excitement of chess to life. Challenge players from around the world, earn ELO, and use the powerful Stockfish engine for in-depth game analysis.
